id.description: The unique identifier for the product

description.description: The detailed description of the product

type.description: The type or category of the product

category.description: The category to which the product belongs

image_url.description: The URL to the image representing the product

home_url.description: The URL for the home page of the product

create_time.description: The date and time when the product was created

update_time.description: The date and time when the product was last updated

href.description: The URL associated with the link

rel.description: The relationship of the link to the product

method.description: The HTTP method used for the link
